attributes.action: Sack Matt Baggott, Chief Constable, Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI).
attributes.additional_details:
Protestant, Unionist and Loyalist People (PUL) have no trust or confidence in Matt Baggott, PSNI Chief. Handling of the PUL flag protests has been, oppressive, overbearing, heavy handed, brutal and disproportionate. PSNI conspired to arrest PUL on trumped-up charges and unreasonably objected to bail whilst republicans walked from court unimpeded, some without bail conditions.
Over 200 PUL people arrested/bailed with suggestions of another 500 to face this tyranny, differing from more serious Republican riots.
Flag protests cost in excess of £20 million, an abuse of his position in trying to suppress legitimate right to peaceful protest by misuse of public funds. He failed to effectively liaise with local community reps, causing groups to walk away from meetings with police.
He failed our community whilst allowing republican terrorists to walk free from gaol and harsh bail conditions which exist for our community.
From day one he caused confusion with PSNI and protestors alike.
